CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: I ds = ( W / 2L ) × μ × C i ( V gs - V th ) The OFET device using as-cast PCDTBT films without thermal annealing exhibits a hole mobility of 2.2 × 10^-4 cm^2 / V°s with an on / off current ratio ( I on / I off ) of 4.44 × 10^3 .

Let's think step by step.

1. W: Width of the OFET device or the width of the channel in the field-effect transistor.
2. L: Length of the OFET device or the length of the channel in the field-effect transistor.
3. μ: Hole mobility of the OFET device, which is a material property.
4. C: Capacitance, which is a material property.
5. i: Current, which is a material property.
6. Vgs: Gate voltage or voltage applied to the gate terminal of the field-effect transistor.
7. Vth: Threshold voltage, which is a material property.
8. PCDTBT: Organic semiconductor material used in the OFET device.

So, the material names in the paragraph are PCDTBT, μ, and C.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

The material names in the paragraph are: PCDTBT, μ, and C.

These entities refer to the organic semiconductor material used in the OFET device (PCDTBT), the hole mobility (μ), and the capacitance (C) of the material.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: I ds = ( W / 2L ) × μ × C i ( V gs - V th ) The OFET device using as-cast PCDTBT films without thermal annealing exhibits a hole mobility of 2.2 × 10^-4 cm^2 / V°s with an on / off current ratio ( I on / I off ) of 4.44 × 10^3 .

Let's think step by step.

1. I: current (both on and off)
2. W: width
3. L: length
4. μ: hole mobility
5. C: capacitance
6. Vgs: gate voltage
7. Vth: threshold voltage
8. PCDTBT: type of films
9. OFET: Organic Field Effect Transistor
10. ds: channel length
11. μ×C: capacitance multiplied by mobility (also known as the "mobility-capacitance product")
12. Ion/Ioff: on/off current ratio.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. μ: hole mobility
2. C: capacitance.

These are the only material properties mentioned in the paragraph.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: I ds = ( W / 2L ) × μ × C i ( V gs - V th ) The OFET device using as-cast PCDTBT films without thermal annealing exhibits a hole mobility of 2.2 × 10^-4 cm^2 / V°s with an on / off current ratio ( I on / I off ) of 4.44 × 10^3 .

Let's think step by step.

1. Ids: It is the drain-source current in an Operating Field Effect Transistor (OFET) device.
2. W: It is the width of the channel in the OFET device.
3. L: It is the length of the channel in the OFET device.
4. μ: It is the hole mobility of the OFET device, which is 2.2 × 10^-4 cm^2 / V°s in this case.
5. C: It is the capacitance of the gate dielectric in the OFET device.
6. Vgs: It is the voltage applied between the gate and the source in the OFET device.
7. Vth: It is the threshold voltage of the OFET device.
8. Ion: It is the on current in the OFET device.
9. Ioff: It is the off current in the OFET device.
10. Ion/Ioff: It is the on/off current ratio of the OFET device, which is 4.44 × 10^3 in this case.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. μ: It is the hole mobility of the OFET device, which is 2.2 × 10^-4 cm^2 / V°s.
2. Ion/Ioff: It is the on/off current ratio of the OFET device, which is 4.44 × 10^3.

These are the only entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to material properties.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| hole mobility: 2.2 × 10^-4 cm^2 / V°s |
| on/off current ratio: 4.44 × 10^3 |
